publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4796 Mr Tom McCabe: Edinburgh Airport Rail Link Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Edinburgh Airport Rail Link Bill, agrees to any expenditure of a kind referred to in Rule 9A.14.3(b)(ii) of the Parliament’s Standing Orders arising in consequence of the Act.

S2M-4796 Mr Tom McCabe: Edinburgh Airport Rail Link Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Edinburgh Airport Rail Link Bill, agrees to any expenditure of a kind referred to in Rule 9A.14.3(b)(ii) of the Parliament’s Standing Orders arising in consequence of the Act.
